text: James Patrick Celebrezze (February 6, 1938 â€“ February 10, 2021) was an American Democratic politician. He was born in Cleveland, Ohio. Celebrezze was a member of the Ohio House of Representatives from 1967 to 1974. Celebrezze died on February 10, 2021 in Cleveland at the age of 83. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2021 deaths Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Politicians from Cleveland Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: James Celebrezze
